dcterms:description: A dataset containing synthetic Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAGs) used for evaluating application placement techniques in edge and fog computing environments.
dcterms:title: Synthetic DAGs

dcterms:creator: M. Goudarzi
H. Wu
M. S. Palaniswami
R. Buyya
dcterms:description: A collection of Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) datasets with varying parameters such as task number, fatness, and density to evaluate application placement techniques.
dcterms:title: DAG datasets with varying parameters (L, fat, density)

dcterms:creator: M. Goudarzi
H. Wu
M. S. Palaniswami
R. Buyya
dcterms:description: Real-world IoT applications modeled as Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAGs) to assess the performance of application placement techniques in fog computing environments.
dcterms:title: Real-world IoT applications modeled as DAGs

dcterms:creator: M. Goudarzi
H. Wu
M. S. Palaniswami
R. Buyya
dcterms:description: A variety of datasets used for training and evaluation of application placement techniques in edge and fog computing environments.
dcterms:title: Various datasets for training and evaluation
